verses.roman:
gopikā-bhāvera ei sudṛḍha niścaya
vrajendra-nandana vinā anyatra nā haya

synonyms: gopikā-bhāvera—of the ecstasy of the gopīs; ei—this; sudṛḍha—firm; niścaya—confirmation; vrajendra-nandana—Lord Śrī Kṛṣṇa; vinā—without; anyatra—anyone else; nā—not; haya—is possible.
translation: It is firmly ascertained that the ecstatic mood of the gopīs is possible only before Kṛṣṇa, and no one else.
